ModMetaData.name: Witching Hour
ModMetaData.author: ✬Rustic Fox✬
ModMetaData.description:
Just because you're stuck on a Rimworld doesn't mean you can't celebrate the best holiday-Halloween!
This mod adds a witches costume, a mummy costume, a vampires costume, a wolfman mask, a broom weapon, a cauldron fermenter, bats and black cats, skeletons, several candy treats and jack o'lanterns and a coffin just in time for the spookiest night of the year!
Credits
Incantation.Games - Original Author
Version: 1.4.2
